info.title: Clever Cloud API
info.description: Use this API to manipulate your Clever Cloud services.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: An owner `id`. It can be a user `id` (i.e. `user_xxx`) for personal space, or an organization `id` (i.e. `orga_xxx`).

schema.title: Owner `id`
schema.description: A user `id` (i.e. `user_xxx`) for personal space, or an organization `id` (i.e. `orga_xxx`).

owner_id.title: Owner `id`
owner_id.description: A user `id` (i.e. `user_xxx`) for personal space, or an organization `id` (i.e. `orga_xxx`).

description.title: Networkgroup Description
description.example: A networkgroup with my apps and add-ons.

items.title: Member
items.description: A networkgroup member is a set of nodes that should be in the network by a simple predicate: `id` is equals to an app `id` (i.e. `app_xxx`), an add-on `id` (i.e. `addon_xxx`) or an external node category `id`.

label.title: Member Label
label.description: Human-readable name of a networkgroup member.

domain-name.title: Member Name
domain-name.description: Member name used in the `<memberName>.m.<ngID>.ng.clever-cloud.com` domain name alias.

type.title: Member Type
type.description: The type of a networkgroup member. It can be an application (`'application'`), an add-on (`'addon'`) or an external node (`'external'`).

hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: Host name of a networkgroup peer.

public-key.title: WireGuard速 Public Key
public-key.description: WireGuard速 public key of a networkgroup peer. It's a Base64-encoded string (hence the format).

type.title: Endpoint Type
type.description: The type of a networkgroup endpoint. It can be a client endpoint (`'ClientEndpoint'`) or a server endpoint (`'ServerEndpoint'`).

User not in organization.value: Authentication is possible but has failed or not yet been provided.

post.description: Adds an external peer to a networkgroup.

peer-role.title: Role
peer-role.description: The role of this peer in the networkgroup. Either client (`'client'`) or server (`'server'`).

public-key.title: WireGuard速 Public Key
public-key.description: WireGuard速 public key of a networkgroup peer. It's a Base64-encoded string (hence the format).

hostname.title: Host Name
hostname.description: Host name of a networkgroup peer.

ip.title: IP Address
ip.description: The public IP on which you are listening (only for `server` role).

port.title: Port
port.description: The public port on which you are listening (only for `server` role).

The request content was malformed:
012.345.678.901 is not a correct ip address: DownField(ip)

Missing field (`public-key`).value:
The request content was malformed:
Attempt to decode value on failed cursor: DownField(public-key)

get.description: Gets the actual WireGuard速 tunnel configuration file for a networkgroup peer. The endpoint returns a `wg-quick` configuration file encoded in Base64 format, without its owner's private key. In `[Interface]`, you have to replace `PrivateKey = <%PrivateKey%>` by the desired private key.

parameters.name: ownerId
parameters.description: An owner `id`. It can be a user `id` (i.e. `user_xxx`) for personal space, or an organization `id` (i.e. `orga_xxx`).

schema.title: Owner `id`
schema.description: A user `id` (i.e. `user_xxx`) for personal space, or an organization `id` (i.e. `orga_xxx`).

schema.title: WireGuard速 Configuration
schema.description: WireGuard速 configuration for a specific networkgroup peer.

version.title: WireGuard速 Public Key
version.description: WireGuard速 public key of a networkgroup peer. It's a Base64-encoded string (hence the format).

configuration.title: WireGuard速 Configuration File
configuration.description: A WireGuard速 tunnel configuration file encoded in Base64 format, without its owner's private key. In `[Interface]`, you have to replace `PrivateKey = <%PrivateKey%>` by the desired private key.

get.description: Retreives the actual WireGuard速 configuration file for a networkgroup peer as a Server Sent Event. The `'conf'` event returns a `wg-quick` configuration file encoded in Base64 format, without its owner's private key. In `[Interface]`, you have to replace `PrivateKey = <%PrivateKey%>` by the desired private key.
